name: Wasabi Cheese & Avocado Sandwich
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp sriracha or green dragon hot sauce (or to taste)
1/4 seedless cucumber or any cucumber of your choice, sliced
3 Slices whole wheat or multigrain sandwich bread

recipeInstructions.text: Peel avocado and remove the pit. Mash it with a fork until creamy and add lemon juice, hot sauce and salt, mixing well
Spread 1/4 of the mashed avocado one of the slices of bread. Add a slice of cheese and 2 tomato slices
Spread 1/4 of mashed avocado on each side of another piece of bread and place it on top of the cheese and tomato
Add another slice of cheese and some cucumber slices on top
Spread the remaining mashed avocado on the last piece of bread and place it on top to complete the sandwich
